import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Cliente} from "../cliente"; import {ClientesService} from "../../clientes.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-clientes-form', templateUrl: './clientes-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clientes-form.component.css'] }) export class ClientesFormComponent implements OnInit{ cliente: Cliente; constructor(private service: ClientesService) { this.cliente=service.getCliente(); } ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit() { this.service .salvar(this.cliente) } }

Clientes

  1. Cadastro
